languages.text: Приняв в темный час беженцев со всего Простора, Янус стал плавильным котлом для культур сотен миров. Он стал оплотом и символом надежды. Когда кризис миновал, началось возвращение беглецов на родные планеты и отвоевание утраченных миров, а Янус получил гордое имя "Дом реконкисты".

Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.
languages.original_text: Приняв в темный час беженцев со всего Простора, Янус стал плавильным котлом для культур сотен миров. Он стал оплотом и символом надежды. Когда кризис миновал, началось возвращение беглецов на родные планеты и отвоевание утраченных миров, а Янус получил гордое имя "Дом реконкисты".

traits.locale_text: Janus became a melting pot for the cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the fugitives started to return to their home planets and to reclaim lost worlds, thus earning Janus a proud name, "The House of Reconquista."

Janus became a melting pot for the cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the fugitives started to return to their home planets and to reclaim lost worlds, thus earning Janus a proud name, "The House of Reconquista."

Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

languages.text: 在这最黑暗的时刻，加努斯接纳了来自整个科罗努斯扩区的难民，几百个世界的不同文化在这个大熔炉里融为一体，也因此成为了安全与希望的象征。这场危机结束之后，加努斯的难民纷纷回到了各自的母星，收复失地。正因如此，加努斯也得到了一个充满荣耀的新名字——“光复之地”。
languages.original_text: Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

traits.locale_text: 在这最黑暗的时刻，加努斯接纳了来自整个科罗努斯扩区的难民，几百个世界的不同文化在这个大熔炉里融为一体，也因此成为了安全与希望的象征。这场危机结束之后，加努斯的难民纷纷回到了各自的母星，收复失地。正因如此，加努斯也得到了一个充满荣耀的新名字——“光复之地”。

languages.text: ヤヌスは一番苦しい時にエクスパンスの至る所からの難民を受け入れ、何百という星から来た文化のるつぼとなった。希望の牙城であり象徴でもあった。危機が去った後、難民達が失われた惑星を再建するため自身の母星へ戻りはじめた。こうしてヤヌスはレコンキスタの故郷という誇り高き名前を得た。
languages.original_text: Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

traits.locale_text: ヤヌスは一番苦しい時にエクスパンスの至る所からの難民を受け入れ、何百という星から来た文化のるつぼとなった。希望の牙城であり象徴でもあった。危機が去った後、難民達が失われた惑星を再建するため自身の母星へ戻りはじめた。こうしてヤヌスはレコンキスタの故郷という誇り高き名前を得た。

languages.text: Janus devint un creuset de cultures de centaines de mondes, en recevant des réfugiés de toutes les Étendues lorsque celles-ci connurent leurs heures les plus sombres. La planète devint une forteresse et un symbole d'espoir. Une fois la crise passée, les réfugiés commencèrent à regagner leurs planètes d'origine et à reconquérir les mondes perdus, ce qui valut à Janus le glorieux surnom de « foyer de la Reconquête ».
languages.original_text: Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

traits.locale_text: Janus devint un creuset de cultures de centaines de mondes, en recevant des réfugiés de toutes les Étendues lorsque celles-ci connurent leurs heures les plus sombres. La planète devint une forteresse et un symbole d'espoir. Une fois la crise passée, les réfugiés commencèrent à regagner leurs planètes d'origine et à reconquérir les mondes perdus, ce qui valut à Janus le glorieux surnom de « foyer de la Reconquête ».

languages.text: Janus se convirtió en un crisol de culturas de cientos de mundos, aceptando a los refugiados de toda la Extensión en sus momentos más oscuros. Era un bastión y un símbolo de la esperanza. Cuando la crisis llegó a su fin, los refugiados empezaron a volver a sus planetas de origen y a reclamar los mundos perdidos, lo que otorgó a Janus su orgulloso sobrenombre: la Cuna de la Reconquista.
languages.original_text: Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

traits.locale_text: Janus se convirtió en un crisol de culturas de cientos de mundos, aceptando a los refugiados de toda la Extensión en sus momentos más oscuros. Era un bastión y un símbolo de la esperanza. Cuando la crisis llegó a su fin, los refugiados empezaron a volver a sus planetas de origen y a reclamar los mundos perdidos, lo que otorgó a Janus su orgulloso sobrenombre: la Cuna de la Reconquista.

languages.text: Janus wurde zum Schmelztiegel für Kulturen aus Hunderten von Welten und nahm aus der gesamten Ausdehnung in ihrer dunkelsten Stunde Flüchtlinge auf. Es wurde ein Bollwerk und ein Symbol der Hoffnung. Nach der Krise kehrten die Flüchtlinge der Reihe nach auf ihre Heimatplaneten zurück und nahmen die verlorenen Welten wieder in Besitz. Und Janus erhielt daraufhin den stolzen Namen "Heimat der Reconquista."
languages.original_text: Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

traits.locale_text: Janus wurde zum Schmelztiegel für Kulturen aus Hunderten von Welten und nahm aus der gesamten Ausdehnung in ihrer dunkelsten Stunde Flüchtlinge auf. Es wurde ein Bollwerk und ein Symbol der Hoffnung. Nach der Krise kehrten die Flüchtlinge der Reihe nach auf ihre Heimatplaneten zurück und nahmen die verlorenen Welten wieder in Besitz. Und Janus erhielt daraufhin den stolzen Namen "Heimat der Reconquista."

languages.text: Enginlik'in dört bir yanında karanlık zamanlardan geçen her tür sığınmacıyı kabul eden Janus, yüzlerce dünyanın kültürünün bir potada eridiği bir yere dönüştü. Bir kale, umudun sembolü oldu. Sığınmacılar, kriz atlatıldıktan sonra yuvaları olan gezegenlere geri dönmeye ve kaybedilmiş dünyaları geri almaya başladı. Janus'a gurur verici olan Yeniden Fethin Yuvası ismini kazandırdılar.
languages.original_text: Janus became a melting pot for cultures from hundreds of worlds, taking in refugees from across the entire Expanse in its darkest hour. It became a stronghold and a symbol of hope. After the crisis passed, the refugees started to return to their home planets and to reclaim the lost worlds, thus earning Janus the proud name — the Home of the Reconquista.

traits.locale_text: Janus, Enginlik'in dört bir köşesinde karanlık zamanlardan geçen her tür sığınmacıyı kabul ederek, yüzlerce dünyanın kültürünün bir potada eridiği bir yer hâline geldi. Bir kale ve bir umut sembolü oldu. Kriz atlatıldıktan sonra sığınmacılar yuvaları olan gezegenlere geri dönmeye ve kaybedilmiş dünyaları geri almaya başladılar, böylece Janus'a o gurur kaynağı ismini kazandırdılar: Yeniden Fethin Yuvası.
